website_summaries.verdict: A durable beanbag chair designed for comfort and style, but it requires a lot of fluffing to keep its shape.
pros: Durable cover that doesn't show stains easily
cons: Takes a couple days for material to expand

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is HORRIBLE like a big FLAT baked potato that takes up most of the wall space in the room!!!! It said give it about 48 hours to fluff up it's been over TWO WEEKS and it's just little lumps of hard stuck pieces of foam through out it and it is NOT comfortable!! When my husband and I both tried to lay one it one could lay and they other got rolled off and that was the reason we bought this was to lay beside each other to watch movies. We HATE THIS! There is no way to fit it in any box to mail it back or we would have already sent it back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsKPot

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great lounge bean bag chairs big enough to hold an adult comfortably with room to spare. In fact we have had an adult and 2 kids on one of ours watching tv. They take a beating and always bounce back to their very plush size.
customer_reviews.author: AGroff

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and in perfect condition. Thankfully I had read other reviews and ...
customer_reviews.text: After searching and searching for a beanbag chair that would be large enough for my 11-year-old grandson so that he would not grow out of it and just a short time, I found this one and immediately ordered it. It arrived on time and in perfect condition. Thankfully I had read other reviews and information about the filler and had taken it out of the vacuum sealed packaging before Christmas so that when I put it in the cover, it did not take long before it had a nice shape. The cover is very soft and it was easy to put together. This product arrived by the expected delivery date. I would definitely recommend this product and the seller
customer_reviews.author: Jan D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy ever
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t inflate and they don’t return your money back. I feel cheated upon by the seller and have thrown this bean bag in garbage where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Swati

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: We got the 4 foot wanting a "chair like" size. It does offer support but this thing is way too heavy to easily move around and by far too large to just toss in your average living room. i would recommend no larger than the 3 foot unless you have a dedicated space where it will stay. It is not easy to change the shape of it like a normal nean bad when you need to readjust. In fact for me (a normal sized 5 1/2 foot tall woman) I would say re-shaping and adjusting is almost impossible without opening it up and making a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Ama

customer_reviews.title: Great movie chair!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I was kinda scared about my order. Delivered very quickly. I opened it up, removed the plastic from the sack and watched as it basically blew up like a balloon. I kicked it a little and flipped over and repeated the kicking for maybe a total of 25 minutes and bam it was done. I don't understand some reviews. This thing was beyond easy. It came with enough memory foam. None of our bottoms touch the ground. It holds two people and 3 dogs nicely. It's my most favorite chair ever! My 9year old love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing...with one caveat
customer_reviews.text: It's incredibly comfortable. I read to my boys at night and it's big enough for all three of us to relax comfortably on. My only complaint is that the foam doesn't seem to rebound much. I have to keep rotating the bag at night so it will settle into it's original plump form. Otherwise it stays in whatever smooshed position it was in before. It's not a huge deal and definitely not a breaker. We love this as a couch replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Naviathan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bean Bag!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two 4-feet Cozy Sack bean bags for our daughters (11 & 14 y/o) in purple and pink. The colors are bright and fun. We have had them for 18 months now and they still look new, despite the strenuous use they have been put through. These really are awesome bean bags! They are very comfortable and the kids love them. It took three days for them to fluff to full size and when they did, they seemed so much bigger than the measurement. They do measure at 4 feet, so I guess it is an optical illusion. We would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but dishonest sizing and awful plastic zippers
customer_reviews.text: Been using this as a bed/couch/recliner for a couple months now, and it's pretty great. The main complaint I have is that the inner zipper for the filling jammed the very first time I closed it and I'll never be able to open it again unless I want to break it. Also, even after laying on it all day and measuring the longest part it's still a few inches short of 6 feet, which is annoying because I'm exactly 6 feet tall. When it's freshly fluffed it's less than 5 feet
customer_reviews.author: Aufero

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as anything, just needs time.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredibly comfortable. Everyone who has come over has all but fallen asleep on the bean bag chair since I ordered it. It is perhaps the best piece of furniture I've ever had to just let yourself flop down on. The memory foam can absorb quite a bit of energy. One word of advice: this thing will take a looooooong time to fully inflate. Even when I would periodically (i.e. a few times a day) shake and fluff the beanbag, it still took nearly a week to grow to its full size. Memory foam is like that. Most of the "flat" pictures I see in these reviews look my my chair about 3 days before it finished regrowing.
customer_reviews.author: eddieoctane

customer_reviews.title: So freaking comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bean bag to be used for napping and sitting on for my daughter and she loves it ! My main regret is that I did not purchase the 7ft been bag. I gave it 4 starts instead of 5 because I do wish that it had a bit more filling maybe mine just did not come with enough but that would be my only complaint . Aside from that it is very comfortable and often find myself getting stuck on it relaxing .
customer_reviews.author: Lavendar Love

customer_reviews.title: Bought two one was five star and second one star so rate three stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought two at the same time. One plumped up great one not so much. Huge differece. Lost contact information and time because of knee injury. Originally bought because with a five and nine year old we were flying through couches. These seemed a perfect solution. I would give one five stars and one one star so settled on three stars. The kids hog the good one and the other is used as needed. They were same shape when they arrived so I am not sure why one did not fluff. I wish I had been able to contact them when one did not fluff up as expected. Happy with quality. Happy with the good one.
customer_reviews.author: Slipknott

customer_reviews.title: Great bean bag and Wonderful Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: (UPDATE) I reached out to Cozy shack to inquire about how I could purchase more filling. They're sending me more at no cost to me with instructions on how to add. Amazing customer service!! Product is huge and awesome though it does feel like it needs more filling which is why I gave it four stars. I'm constantly trying to fluff it up so I don't sink to the floor (I'm 5'10'' at 160#) which is difficult to do to a large bean bag. But if it had more filling it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Heath

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to wash cover
customer_reviews.text: Have owned the 5' version for 7 years, and the 3' version for 2 years. Love the covers. They are soft and they wash and dry with no issues. They both came filled with an appropriate amount of filling. Have had no issues with the bags. The 3' version is great for one person (adult) to sit and watch TV or use as a footrest. The 5' version is big enough for an adult to sleep on. Would like a different color cover for the 3' one, and am searching for one that fits, feels good, and is washable, all at a reasonable price (i.e. significantly less than buying a whole new chair).
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: My boys absolutely love it! It is comfy and fluffs back up ...
customer_reviews.text: This 7’ cozy sack is MASSIVE! My boys absolutely love it! It is comfy and fluffs back up nicely. At first there wasn’t quite enough foam to support my husband or me, and we would sink clear to the ground. I emailed the company and their customer service was phenomenal. They explained that only occasionally some sacks get shipped with less foam than needed, and they sent me extra foam. It worked like a charm! It does take some time and manual manipulation to fluff all of the foam up initially. We love our cozy sack! (Pics: 1st is my 5 yr old before extra foam, 2nd is fluffed AFTER foam added, 3rd is my 9yr old after foam.)
customer_reviews.author: RaSDow

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Possibly Even OVER-stuffed
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to imagine how huge this thing will be. It says 6-foot, so you know it's gonna be huge. But wow. I was going to ding this thing a star because it's overstuffed - the filling... there's too much of it. But that would be like going to a Michelin Star restaurant and dinging them because they gave you too much food. I'm thinking of pulling some of the stuffing out of this thing to make it a little more floppy. Right now it's somewhat globular in shape (actually more or less like the picture shows it). It's a quality product that is what they advertise it to be.
customer_reviews.author: time. less.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as long as you sit on it properly!
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag is HUGE. I ordered four feet and it was more than enough. I'm 5'5" and I can comfortably curl up in this. The cover is a nice material and the color is accurately portrayed in the photos. Overall, I'm very satisfied with this purchase. Okay, so the biggest thing with this is that you MUST sit in it properly. If you look at the cover in the photos, you can see the seams of the cover are on the SIDES of the person sitting. Don't place this bean bag so that you're sitting on the large, circular panel. Follow the photos and the instructions and you'll have a lot more back support.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: The hardest thing I ever had to return!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE!!! We returned it but had to purchase a shop vac just to get this thing into a box. Took us 3 days to rerun it based on size and efforts to shrink it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this! Awesome purchase! It’s big, but so comfortable. My husband and I can lay on it together or one of us with both kids. You do have to fluff it up every few days but always fills back out. It is used daily in our house and still in great shape after 5 months. SO happy we got this. It dose take a few days to get to it’s full size so don’t worry when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: scott harris

customer_reviews.title: 6' sack is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 6' sack and while my kids love it, I can honestly say I was surprised just how big it got despite reading reviews from others describing the size. The sack can easily fit two kids under ten plus an adult, though the memory foam means it gets a little sloppy and unsupportive when you have the thing loaded down with people. Like others have said, YOU MUST BREAK UP THE FOAM AFTER UNBOXING. It was an excellent forearm exercise to pull the foam pieces apart as the foam expanded from the packing cube, but certainly worth the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Appears I Received A Bad Item
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up with the protective air sealed bag ripped. The zipper on the inside bag is broken and the foam won’t stay in and when I relapsed it from the bag and let it stand for 48 hours it didn’t fill out like it was supposed to. I was foolish and traveling and could not return it within the window. My friend has two of these and they are AMAZING but it appears I received a lame item.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: super big, super soft
customer_reviews.text: only piece of furniture in my apartment living room. its the place to crash. super big, super soft. getting it out of the vacuum packed box and into bean bag form was a PAIN IN THE PATOOT. a full body work out. but thank goodness it only needs to be done once. and it was worth it. i've had it for a good year and a half now. only the cover has ripped a bit at the seams. but that is to be expected with how much we use it. and we don't have a couch, so that's every minute of every day.
customer_reviews.author: MESfairy

customer_reviews.title: Its cool but should be under $100
customer_reviews.text: Its not bad but like others say.. it is lumpy and never soothes out. It is workable but its decently NOT like a bean bag. Its more like... well, a bunch of memory foam cut up and put in a back. It doesn't inflate like the pictures show. I still like it and use it but it should have been $100.. NOT $260 or whatever I paid. I do like the cover it came with. nice quality. oh yeah, and it is heavy as H E L L! lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY BLUE 6 FOOT & 5 FOOT BLUE
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE. These things ARE MASSIVE- AND GIANTS ARE 1000% REAL. NEPHELIM. GENESIS CHAPTER SIX. AND THEY ARE VERY HEAVY, Due to the material and shape hard to move. and Once in a room ( A BIG DOOR OPENING IS A MUST. I HAD A VERY HARD TIME MOVING IT FROM MY 12"X22" KITCHEN INTO MY LIVINGROOM WITH A 36" OPENING. I KNOW A GUY IN COLLEGE, HE HAD TO MOVE IT--HE HAD TO CUT IT UP AND IT WAS A HUGE MESS. BUT I LOVE THEM, I SHOULD HAVE BOUGHT THE4 4 FOOT. I THINK I HAVE A PIC.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G. Delabre

customer_reviews.title: Versatle Bean Bag
customer_reviews.text: Stuffing comes in a white zipper bag and it comes with another zippered bag (the color you picked) so you can wash as needed. You can use this bean bag for just about anything remotely relaxing. 4 stars because I may need to buy more stuffing for the bag. It's good for now and the family loves it but we all agree there could be a little more stuffing to firm up the bag while playing video games. Overall - quality material and the best part, it has a removable bag so you can wash it whenever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Mifflin

customer_reviews.title: A perfect spot to encourage reading
customer_reviews.text: We researched a lot of bean bags for our 9 year old daughter prior to purchasing this one. The LoveSac brand was very nice but simply too expensive. Most other brands we're simply too cheap. This one is perfect - a great size, high-quality, and best of all has a removable cover that's washable. As other reviewers have noted, it comes "deflated" and takes about 2 days to expand fully. I would say it also takes time to break-in. The first few months it seems too firm and my daughter felt like she was being pushed out. Now though, after about 9 months it's her favorite place to read. It's big enough for a adult and a pre-teen.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: I like the chair
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair, but I've owned other foam-filled chairs, and it was very difficult to break down the foam with this one. The cover is too big -- probably because not all the foam is broken down yet. It is comfortable, though. My chair isn't 6 feet long -- again maybe a foam issue. The price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Good bag but UNDERFILLED significantly
customer_reviews.text: Bag is very large and soft. It is much too underfilled to be practical however. I sink down to nearly the floor and there is no back/body support when sitting due to it being underfilled. I wanted to LOVE this bag but only ended up liking it. Deffinetly need to find additional memory foam filler somewhere. (The image photo has about 1/3 additional foam it looks like than is actually in the bag. Shopper beware.) Cover is super soft and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: K1984

customer_reviews.title: Color isn't
customer_reviews.text: My sister has two of these and I like them very much but the cinnabar did not come as described.it is somewhere between hot pink and red where in the picture it looks a lot more like a red. It also has a velvety texture which I do not like. now I don't know what to do because I don't really want to go through the hassle of sending this back during this pandemic. Just wanted people to know that the color is not true.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, OK filling.
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect, the material the bag is made of is pretty nice. It cleans up well. My biggest issue is the fill. I had a different brand years ago which was the same size but it seemed a lot more "springier" I guess. For the price, it's not bad. I can always replace the fill.
customer_reviews.author: Chef B

customer_reviews.title: This company makes amazing products. This is our second purchase and we ...
customer_reviews.text: This company makes amazing products. This is our second purchase and we will continue to support this all american company. Cozy Sacks are comfortable, durable and easy to clean. We love them. They help out when I am sick and need a place to lay down. They are made of a comfortable memory foam. The 5 ft is just the right size for me. We had a 6 ft last time and I had to jump up to get onto the bean bag, but this one is just the right height.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: You get what you see!
customer_reviews.text: A big soft bag of puffs to rest on! The best part is the washable cover. This has basically become a glorified dog bed for our 10 lb silky terrier. She has vomited several times on it. It washes up perfectly and you'd never know it happened! Whenever its starts getting to flat, rotate it and its good as new. We enjoy it! Note: I am writing this review 4 years after purchase. The bag is still in our living room and looks as good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Kadi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought gray a couple weeks ago and happy so far. The size is about accurate to the description, it just feels bigger because of its shape. Opened the inner fastner to tear apart forms for the first two days... a bit of work. Grey color is very close to the second fablic picture of the product pictures. The first one with the girl looks lighter and more blue-ish. Quality of the cover is excellent. My room is coordinated between white and dark brown, but this gray nicely blends in. Posted pictures before and after use. One-star off for not shaping for back support. The angle is not for reading but comfortable watching a wall-mounted TV.
customer_reviews.author: sayang

customer_reviews.title: Huge Memory Foam Bag
customer_reviews.text: It is massive. Take the time to pull apart the foam inside into smaller pieces with a couple of people working at it and after it fluffs up fully you put it inside of the super soft bag and zip it up. The bag spot cleans up so well I just used baby wipes. I am very happy with my purchase and I would recommend to those that have space in their homes for a bag this big.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda from Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Huge and comfy
customer_reviews.text: It came so small and compact. It was heavy though. It took me a few hours to set it up and fluff it and really work all the pieces of foam and it actually settled really well. Next day I think the actual size filled in. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know that I’ve ever loved a piece of furniture this much. If I could live in this chair, I would. It brings me so much comfort and joy. It’s like 50 lbs, but I still drag it from room to room with me. This thing is HUGE. It’s taller than expected too. You can rearrange it so you’re sinking down into it if you’re on your own, or turn it on it’s side if your kids want to share some space with you.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were low due to the price tag, but wow! I read and listened to the reviews on set up and within 24-48 hours, it puffed up like a cupcake. It really helps to knead and break apart the foam on your own. Gaming is so much comfier now and easier on my back. I got the 3 ft and it’s comfy for someone who is 5’6. Very much cat approved as well.
customer_reviews.author: BillButtLicker

customer_reviews.title: Flat super flat
customer_reviews.text: We followed the instructions completely but it has been flat since we got it. We have fluffed it multiple times but it’s almost like it’s missing stuffing. For the price I am very disappointed and had hoped for a much fluffier seat for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! We just received our 4 foot bag yesterday and are already just so excited. It has already POOFED all the way. We will probably buy another for our guest bedroom. It is totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lori D Dietert

customer_reviews.title: Quality, easy clean.
customer_reviews.text: This is a supper comfy seat. Toatally supportive and conforming. I like to use a pillow to prop my head to see the tv. I’m not a big guy(5’2”,155lb) so I can get lost in its massiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cozy
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit large & heavy (i got the 4' one) - but I love it. We use it in our "rec" room for playing video games or watching movies. My 3 kids can fit in it, snuggles together. It does need to be rotated periodically & re-fluffed but hasn't flattened on me like the regular bean type chairs do. It's comfy & cozy & I'm so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: little car

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This was filled with a more foamy filler than bean. After a while you would sink in too much and have to get out and readjust. Good quality on outside. I had to return - I knew it was big, but it was huge and I could not move it from place to place. You would have to leave this in one space. Hard to get through a door but can squeeze it through.
customer_reviews.author: L. Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Great for a dorm room!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair 10 months ago and my daughter used it in her dorm room for the school year. We just brought all of her stuff back home. I washed the cover and it looks like new. She loved having this chair as a comfy place to study or watch videos on her computer. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Huge, comfortable, and fluffs up nicely after use if you kick it a few times. :)
customer_reviews.text: This chair is FANTASTIC! VERY comfortable ( you can shape it into whatever comfy chair you want ), large enough for two people to sit comfortably, and most importantly NOT SMELLY! (many foam products stink horribly for a while) It does take ~2 days to fluff up fully after you pull it out of the box, but it can be sped up a bit of you and a few friends have a "kick the chair" party (no shoes please!) a few times to help it break up and expand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: After reading ALL the other reviews on this product (Cozy Sack), I decided to go for it. I have NO REGRETS. I even ordered a 2nd one for my living room. The kids (6yrs, 3yrs, 9months) have claimed the 1st one (all 3 can relax on it comfortably together) and since my husband and I love to relax on it too ... figured we would just order another one versus sitting on the couch. 1. It feels and looks a lot bigger than the one in the picture. 2. Super comfortable 3. love the color and fabric - feels and looks great! 4. best quality i have been able to find!
customer_reviews.author: MICAM

customer_reviews.title: The furniture I rented from my apartment was terribly stiff. So I decided to buy this bean ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is HUGE! This is a must for any game room/man cave! The furniture I rented from my apartment was terribly stiff. So I decided to buy this bean bag and I use it everyday! It is incredibly comfortable and there is definitely room for two people on this. Occasionally it needs to be fluffed because overtime it will conform to the shape of your body. The outside of the bag is removable so that it may be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable beanbag
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT like that anytime it is moved it looses shape and blows up like a big marshmallow. Takes about 10 or so times of laying and trying to get back down to beanbag style shape. It is very comfortable, enough room for me, husband and our 2 little dogs. I like cover is removable and washable. Bigger than expected. Need plenty space for this.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Stay away very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s room, I followed the instructions and after three days it finally broke into big lumps very irregular and uncomfortable lumps
customer_reviews.author: Issam N. Mansour

customer_reviews.title: Bag doesn’t expand back; heavy and difficult to reshape
customer_reviews.text: I personally do not like this bag chair. Have had it a few months now. I only think it’s good for small kids to lounge in. I expected it to but it does not expand back and because it is very heavy and bulky, it can be difficult to maneuver around and reshape it. It’s always flat. Seems like there isn’t enough foam inside as the cover is very loose or maybe that’s because the foam does not expand back. I also don’t think mine is 6’ across either as I’m shorter and my body doesn’t fit fully on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not Fluffy Enough
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this for my media room upstairs, since my couch wouldn’t fit up the stairs. The couch itself is very comfortable initially, but it didn’t fluff up quite like I was expecting. I decided to purchase more memory foam filler and when I tried to stuff the beanbag realized that the inner zipper was missing the toggle and no tool would make the zipper budge. So now I have a bag of memory foam sitting next to my couch with no way to use it, pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of years ago and it's been a staple of my room ever since. I sit in it sometimes to read or just relax in contemplation. It's always reliable seating when the boys come over for movie night or just about anything else. My friends love it, and I've had several who have slept on it without any trouble or discomfort. The cover comes off easily for cleaning too, which is a big plus-- just throw it in the laundry and you're all set. Great product, and I would buy another one if I ever had to.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian W.

customer_reviews.title: Jabba the Hutt size
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter’s room and it was huge. It was like having Jabba the Hutt in her room. She liked it somewhat but not enough to keep it around into high school. It was somewhat comfortable but not very supportive. It was mainly her reading chair but she chose to sit on her bed rather than on Jabba.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worthless blob of material
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. It's so deceptively advertised. It's a blob of material stuffed with foam that is NOT COMFORTABLE -- in fact even uncomfortable. Some foam stuffing is "globbed" together and even hurts to sit on. We have tried everything -- shaking it out - jumping on it. One of the most disappointing purchases I have ever made on Amazon EVER. If I could give it zero stars -- I would. THIS IS NOT A BEAN BAG CHAIR -- not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Happy CPA

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have stated, it took a many days to knead the bean bag properly. I bought the 7 foot bag and it requires constant fluffing. And then if you don’t fluff well you simply sink into a lumpy blog where your head or feel sit too high or you roll off. I had purchased another bean bag comparable from another vendor 5 years ago that is light years more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dyun1dyun1

customer_reviews.title: Our second Cozy sack.  A quality product.
customer_reviews.text: We liked our old one very much but it was the 4' model. It was too big for our room so after a couple years we gave it away. My 120lb. Dog loved to lay on it and we missed it quite a lot. I decided to order the 3' model and it is considerably smaller. For me it works well. It could use a little more stuffing but that's being a little nitpicky in my opinion. Maybe we were just used to the old one. Cover is removable and washes up well. We went through many lower priced bean bag chairs over the past 15 years. These are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Berner

customer_reviews.title: We don’t like it, but the dogs do.
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable. It sinks waaaay down. Our dogs love it, so it’s an expensive dog bed I guess. We don’t use it, it’s sitting in an empty room now. We will likely just bite the bullet and spend the big bucks for a Love Sac. I could see smaller children liking it, but for adults not so much. The cover comes off and is washable so that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: b409

customer_reviews.title: The original 6 foot one fit one adult and two 80lb dogs comfortably. After 7 years
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because after having to rehome my 6ft Cozy Sack due to lack of space in the new house, I realized that half the size is too small for an adult and 80lb dog. The original 6 foot one fit one adult and two 80lb dogs comfortably. After 7 years, it still held up well. I went through withdrawals after giving it away and purchased one half the size. This is the absolute best product with a removable cover. Add a blanket to the top and you will be able to keep it fresh and clean for years. Next time I would have purchased the 4ft size for one adult plus dog.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t really work for people with back injuries but then again what does? It takes 48 hrs after unpacking to take its form. I put the cover on after about 12hrs which I DEFINITELY suggest. It’s super comfy. It’s very heavy and awkward so put it where you want it before the 48hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not as fluffy as thought
customer_reviews.text: It is okay quality fabric but doesn't have enough stuffing. To buy more is around 50 bucks which is needed to make it comfortable. I am 6' 225lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described - perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I spent way too much time reading hundreds of bean bag chair reviews. I ordered this one & crossed my fingers while i waited for it to be delivered. I am soooo delighted with this “chair”. My husband was very active in the beating & fluffing - so our chair looked like this only a few hours after unboxing. Everything was great as far as packaging, instructions, etc. The only thing i find lacking in this purchase is the limited fabric cover choices.
customer_reviews.author: STAYATHOMEMOM

customer_reviews.title: Its very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so ugly but it’s so comfortable you forget it’s ugly. It’s so comfortable you. Fall asleep on it. We love it. After having this thing for a while I figured out that it really helps my back to sleep on this. I couldn’t sleep in my bed so I just decided to sleep on the bean bag and I slept fine all night without pain. I’m very grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele Stamp

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, however this bag clearly does not have enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Received beanbag, took 3 days to "infalte" after being air sealed in a bag. It expanded, looks nice, however this bag clearly does not have enough stuffing in it. the two ends will stay fluffy, but the center is literally on the floor. We have refluffed, turned, and fliped the couch - and still one area or another is directly on the ground. Still waiting to hear how much stuffing will cost to put in. Only thing that makes this 3 star rather than 5 is the lack of stuffing in our bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Needs more stuffing inside
customer_reviews.text: Used it for taking naps and such. Followed the instructions on how to fluff it but somehow when you lay on it does not really hold your weight and I’m only 100 lbs. I would sit on it and I’m almost touching the floor. Really disappointed as the item may need more inserts on it.
customer_reviews.author: Peeves

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and slippery
customer_reviews.text: This seat did not feel comfortable or supportive. It was filled, but just not as comfortable as we anticipated with the description and other reviews. It is also very slippery because of the fabric and so we kept sliding down and having to reposition. Just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: The buckskin color is a grey-brown and quite light, which is what I wanted. We got the 4” and it’s huge. I appreciated the photos other people posted for reference. Plenty big for teen boys to lounge on at home. No smell. “Fluffed” as expected. Kids are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Rural Mom

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my granddaughter for Christmas: My daughter, granddaughter and little grandson can all lay on it together to watch movies. They love it! It’s really puffy when not sitting on it so be aware of the space you’ll need. They have a large front room so it works. The cover can be removed and laundered so a big plus. I recommend it if you have the room
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: 4ft is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag has been used as a bed at several slumber parties already! We bought for my 11year old son and are very impressed with it. The cover unzips so it can be cleaned. The shape is awesome. Super easy to put together: foam bag will come with all the air extracted and the cover is separate. You open the plastic around the foam insides and it starts to puff up and take shape. Once is has had some time to ‘rise’ insert it into the cover as per instructions and it is sooooo comfy. My husband and I enjoy it too! Phenomenal product.
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: ... no longer sit on the couch This is so comfortable while lying in it I often have a hard ...
customer_reviews.text: I no longer sit on the couch This is so comfortable while lying in it I often have a hard time staying awake. Don't ever buy a bean filled chair. This is memory foam. It is far superior. The color is exact to the picture, great quality and it certainly is big. I had contacted the seller with a question and I got a response the same day (on the weekend) Not for any problem with the product. This chair is awesome ! It comes in different sizes Be sure to pick the correct size to fit you needs and room
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: It's a great sack. I'm 6'2" ~190 lbs
customer_reviews.text: It's a great sack. I'm 6'2" ~190 lbs, and I find this very comfortable. Being bigger, I don't sink into it, but sit in it very much like the picture. Fabric is will stitched and holds up well. There was a chemical smell... that lasted about a week. I've moved since buying it... while hard to get through doors, it's manageable, though getting it into a vehicle was quite a challenge. Held up really well through the move and the foam is still "fluffy". I'd probably go up a size for my next order, it's a little smaller then I'd like for my size(I like to sink into them).
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Bean-bag style, but with comfy foam instead
customer_reviews.text: It's a great stuffed bag. It's stuffed with foam, not 'beans' so I wouldn't call it a 'bean bag chair' other than that's the style. I like the foam better--softer and can be added to if you want more solidity. Ships in a vacuum-sealed bag inside a box. Pretty necessary given the product. But takes some work to get it expanded. I let it set for 48 hours and then had to work it pretty good for 20-30min to break up the foam. Still ended-up being a great, comfy chair. Cover seems pretty sturdy and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and limp
customer_reviews.text: Hardly as full as pictured, its like a round flat dog bed you cant possibly sit up in. Its also incredibly heavy for how deflated it is. I can't possibly ship this back it weighs so much, so I'm stuck with it. This is full of heavy memory foam shreds, not traditional styrofoam balls that are light weight.
customer_reviews.author: bryandbx

customer_reviews.title: and the filling material looks pretty good and you can tell what it is (not ...
customer_reviews.text: The cover is soft. and the filling material looks pretty good and you can tell what it is (not chunks of who knows what) Count on this bean bag to just lay down and fall asleep in heaven. It is huge, and I love this but hubby is a little unhappy about how it looks > enourmous and tall. If you are looking for something stylish maybe bean bags are not for you, but if you need a spot to really relax, go for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Huge!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge!!!! This thing is a lot bigger than expected and what was seen in the pictures. Takes up my whole entire living room. Probably not ideal for small apartments unless you want to get rid of a couch or your bed. It is possibly the most comfortable thing I've ever sat or slept on though. My 5lb chiweenie loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I wish I had a bigger one ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I wish I had a bigger one so I could cuddle up more comfortably. All my dogs and cats love it and I can barely sit on it anymore because it’s always occupied with a bunch of animals hahaha I have to fluff it up constantly because if I don’t it’ll get really flat and and uncomfortable. Also it doesn’t keep a shape of a ‘chair’ but more like a bed. Do you won’t be able to sit upright with back support. I really like how it has a removable cover that was super easy to put back on by myself. Would recommend if you’re just looking to have something to relax on and not necessarily sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah ahlen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is huge and comfy. We ordered this item to fit in a dorm room instead of a futon/couch and it worked perfectly. The 'stuffing' does arrive in a tight, compact cube. We had to 'unfluff' ourselves, which was a little laboring at first, but once you get it started, it isn't too hard, and was well worth the effort when it was all said and done with.
customer_reviews.author: Kibangles

customer_reviews.title: The most popular seat in the house!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sunroom and i absolutely love this. It filled up in about an hour and was ready to go. Looooove this seat, very supportive and comfy. You sink but its like you're sitting on a marshmello. Amazing! I am probably going to purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome! I was a little reluctant to spend the money but I’m so glad I went ahead and got it. My daughter got a loft bed And I wanted to give her a space outside of her bed to sit on. It’s awesome! The only thing I want to find for it is a waterproof protector under the microfiber outer cover. Then I wouldn’t worry. It’s well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate “Netflix and Chill” accessory
customer_reviews.text: This has only been in my house for 3 days and I am already considering buying another. Completely replaced my couch. My girlfriend loves it because we can both lay in the living room together without one of us hanging onto the edge of a couch for dear life. The ultimate “Netflix and Chill” accessory
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I read the reviews prior to buying it so I knew it would take some work to set up and to make sure I unpacked it in the room I wanted it to stay in. Its huge. I bought the 3 feet chair in purple and it def takes up a lot of space but its Ok. I needed a chair to lounge in while in my 15 year old daughter's room. I literally plop down and we chat. Its comfortable enough to doze in. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received my chair but it does not look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I received my chair but it does not look like the picture. It is flat and looks broken down. It appears like it is missing half the foam that is suppose to be in the chair. I tried following the recommendations for fluffing it but nothing works. I bottom out whenever I sit in it. I am not real happy with it at this point. It needs much more foam.
customer_reviews.author: Carpet Master

customer_reviews.title: I really like the idea of this
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this, but we had ours for a year now, and it hasn't turned out like I thought. We let it puff up like other reviewers have said, but it seems like the foam sticks together so that when you try and plump it up it's just lumpy and not really easy to sink into. Our zipper also broke within the first two months. Now the inner shell is coming apart at the seams and foam is everywhere. I wouldn't really recommend this as it doesn't hold up well and it really wasn't very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Mtuck8

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It is easily the most comfortable spot in the house. I would recommend unpacking it in the room and general area you are going to place it. Once out of the box, it expands and triples in size making it extremely difficult to move through furniture and doorways. The bag it comes in is clear and there are good chunks of foam inside, no trash, no hard pieces. Get the cover on fast before it expands too much. I hope you enjoy your cozy sack as much as me and my family do. I can't count the number of times I've fallen asleep in this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: Great Bean Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable bean bag! Absolutely love the royal blue color! Love that the cover comes off to wash it - especially since my Bulldog loves diving in the thing, spitting drool and shedding more than 10 dogs do all over the thing! My recommendation (not a complaint) is if you are not very strong, order a smaller one because it is heavy! I am a 34 year old, strong male and it even gets heavy for me to pick it up sometimes to fluff the thing out - so if you are a smaller female or much older than I am - you will very much appreciate a smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Flat, lumpy, and not at all comfy..
customer_reviews.text: Yes, that is a miniature australian shepherd.. This beanbag "chair" is nothing of the sorts. It is so flat and lumpy when I sit on it I go straight down to the hardwood floor. I doubt I will be able to return it since there is no box big enough. I would not suggest purchasing this unless you need a large dog bed!
customer_reviews.author: koty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome living room addition
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Cozy ! Easy set up ! Only issue is it can get extremely warm due to the micro fiber cover, I just throw a sheet over it and it helps some
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great success with my teenage son!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good quality. Just give it some time to inflate and make sure you roll it around keeping the stitches vertical, otherwise it will just look like a flat cylinder taking a lot of floor space. This was puzzling to us at first, until we noticed the vertical stitches in the pictures on the web and my son turned the sack around, and..... voila'!! it was perfect... too perfect!! He now spends all his relaxing time sitting on this thing reading and playing his games... He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: roxnitti

customer_reviews.title: The kids like it
customer_reviews.text: The kids like it, and they claim that it is very comfortable. I wish they wouldn't eat or drink on it because it shows stains too easily, and it is a pain to remove the outside covering for laundering. So far it is holding up well to their jumping on it and dragging it around the room. A little expensive, but since we couldn't fit a couch through the narrow doorway of our bonus room, this ended up being a good alternative. Just needs to be fluffed every couple of days to keep it puffy.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda Eve

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, design needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for four years. It has held up really, really well. My kids love to jump on it from other furniture. However, we hardly ever sit on it as a seat. It just takes too much effort to get it in the right position for upright comfortable sitting that will support your back for a long time (like to watch a video).
customer_reviews.author: NoCorn

customer_reviews.title: Great great product. MADE IN USA
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these beanbags at various different sizes they are very quality and comfortable. They are easy to clean by removing the outer cover and just simply throwing it in the washer. Just like any beanbag after about an hour you sink in like a taco. I made one of my downstairs living room into a beanbag chill/movie room. Needless to say the ladies love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Most importantly - This thing is ENORMOUS. We've had it a week and got the 4 foot one. It just keeps growing and is heavy to move around. I think it's good value for money - the zippers are good. The inner cover is strong enough. The outer cover seems ok but the pile is really really low even for faux suede (aka microsuede). It's stuffed with very small scraps of shredded foam so you can fluff it exactly as you want it. Overall, I don't regret it, but it's so big as to be pretty ungainly.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was super surprised at the high quality. Extremely comfortable. I could be mistaken but it would appear it’s full of like a shred it up memory foam or something. It’s pretty awesome! I would highly recommend if you’re looking
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: This our favorite piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This our favorite piece of furniture. 12 and 10 year old boys and a pit bull. Wife and I also spend a lot of time on it. We have had it for about 18 months and it has worn very little and has kept all of its life
customer_reviews.author: Mike Arraiz

customer_reviews.title: Love our Cozy Sacks!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Cozy Sack (the first was purchased for my son two years ago.) We LOVE our Cozy Sacks. They are large, but the perfect size to snuggle and read (I can fit along with my two pre-school children), and they will definitely grow with our kids. They are also more comfortable than traditional bean bag chairs, as they are filled with pieces of soft memory foam. There was a slight glitch with the sack we purchased for our daughter, but customer service handled promptly (on Christmas Eve, no less!) - I was very impressed. I would HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for one
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice beanbag, though a bit small for more than 1 adult and a little difficult if you really want to lounge in it. We debated getting the 5-foot, but didn't want it to be too huge to move. This is a perfect size for our elementary-school aged kids and they love it, but it's not quite so comfy for the parents. The lime green is a nice color and it came quickly and was a breeze to set up. Glad we didn't want to return, though, because I'm not sure how that would have worked!
customer_reviews.author: T2P

customer_reviews.title: Flattened quickly
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVED this when we first purchased. It was incredibly comfortable and fit one adult and one child fully laying down, or three people sitting. Unfortunately, after a little more than 3 months it feels flat, and is nowhere near as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Get a real bean bag chair
customer_reviews.text: Had very high hopes, but this is not at all what I expected. It’s way bigger than you think it is, so plan on keeping it in a large space. It’s not really a bean bag chair but it’s filled with foam and it’s not very supportive. It props your back up and your legs and your bottom is in the middle, on the floor essentially. Skip this thing it’s a beast and it’s not very good, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Pyle

customer_reviews.title: COMFY but UGLY
customer_reviews.text: Chair /beanbag is comfortable , I slept in it two nights BUT ITS HUGE and when it puffs back up its just ugly. It's also very hard tomove because it is heavy. Not a nice "chair" for say a living room. Mine is in the finished basement
customer_reviews.author: Cavimom

customer_reviews.title: really big
customer_reviews.text: Cozy Sack 4-feet Bean Bag Chair review After seeing this size of bean bag in real life, I should have purchased a 3 footer. It's so large that it is difficult for one person to carry on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these for our living room. As other reviewers indicate, they are large. Definitely measure the space in which you want to put them. These do take awhile to fluff out fully and will need some pulling (as instructed). But once they are ready to use, they are so comfortable. Our whole family loves them. I would have given a 5 star review but for one drawback: they are heavy and cumbersome to move around.
customer_reviews.author: bigbusyfamily

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Sack HAS BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cozy Sack HAS BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!! I ordered a 5 foot black sack and by a labeling error received a 2 foot navy sack. I contacted Cozy Sack by email and they responded immediately ON A WEEKEND! They shipped out a 5 foot sack right away and told me to keep the 2 foot sack as a gift! WOW. Also, the sack is great for TV lounging - I've fallen asleep in it several nights now.
customer_reviews.author: Divo Mom

product_meta.title: Cozy Sack 6-Feet Bean Bag Chair, Large, Royal
product_meta.description: Size:6 feet| Color:Royal BlueWith over 15 years of production experience and millions of happy customers the Cozy Sack bean bag chair has become a marketplace favorite. It’s all about the FOAM: Cozy Foam’s long smooth strands are designed for maximum comfort and durability. Our unique design prevents lumpy uncomfortable spots created from the irregular shapes in many shredded foam fills. It really is about the FOAM: Cozy Foam is made from 100% CertiPUR-US certified foam. Certified foams Do Not Contain: Formaldehyde, Phthalates, PBDEs, TDCPP, TCEP, mercury, lead and other heavy medals.
feature_bullets: It’s all about the FOAM: Cozy Foam’s long smooth strands are designed for maximum comfort and durability. Our unique design prevents lumpy uncomfortable spots created from irregularly shaped shredded foam fills.

PROTECTIVE LINER: Durable Cozy Sack liners protect our patent pending bean bag filler and make it possible to remove chair’s outer cover for cleaning or replacement.
BEAN BAG CHAIR COVERS: Colorful sack covers made of micro suede fabric. We know spills happen, durable Cozy Covers can be machine washed or simply replaced to match your changing décor.
